summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4578 for the improvement of the alley in block 43, Pontius 2nd Supplemental Addition, being the alley from East Mercer Street to East Roy Street, between Belmont Avenue North and Summit Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53411, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
